instructions: Make sure your Mac or PC is updated. If you're using iTunes, make sure you have the latest version . If you can't access a computer and your device still works, you can erase and restore your device without a computer . If you want to save the information on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod, make a backup . Go to Settings > [your name] > iCloud, tap Find My iPhone, then turn it off. For an unresponsive device or one that won't turn on, learn what to do . If you forgot your passcode, get help .
